This Niccola Front Flap Briefcase from Persaman NY is constructed from a rich, Italian leather with brass-finish hardware. Features include a double gusset design with exterior & interior zip pockets, 2 interior folder/laptop compartments, and a removable shoulder strap. Bag Features Constructed from smooth Italian leatherFront flap with locking push-lock closure (includes key)Rear exterior zip pocketDouble gusset design with 2 interior folder/laptop compartments; interior of each compartment measures 14.0" wide x 11.0" high x 1.5" deepInterior center divider zip pocketLeather top carry handleBrass-finish hardwareIncludes a removable & adjustable leather shoulder strap for convenient over-the-shoulder carryingDimensions: 15.5"wide x 12.0" high x 5.0" deepWeight: Approximately 3 lbs Thanks for looking!
